thread.title: 19-year-old gets life in prison without parole for meat shop owner murder
thread.title_full: 19-year-old gets life in prison without parole for meat shop owner murder

author: Oona Goodin-Smith | ogoodins@mlive.com
title: 19-year-old gets life in prison without parole for meat shop owner murder
text: In Genesee Circuit Court on Tuesday, Feb. 14, Judge Judith Fullerton sentenced Jawone Laquan Watkins of Flint to life in prison without parole after a jury convicted him of the first-degree felony murder of 66-year-old George Assaf.
